author: radup
msg: Fixed JIRA XMLBEANS-180. Contributed by Dan Durkin.
Changed the way configuration files are processed, trying to not invoke JAM unless needed.
Re-checked in the UNIX scripts, since they need to be checked in from a Linux/UNIX box to work properly.

author: cam
msg: 1. The SVG namespace declaration is now not assumed for the document element
when an SVG declaration is not present.  Certain non-conformant content
will now be identified as being in error.
2. Updated test files to include the SVG namespace declaration.

author: mmarinschek
msg: correctly handle facet header when rendering

author: rgardler
msg: refactor resolving of 'skin' stylesheets to use locationmap

author: cam
msg: 1. Updated test files to include the SVG namespace declaration.
